issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113918 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.10 unlocalized scaffold NT_113918 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (BX322640.4).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37.

issue.summary: Sequence error (insertion) in last coding exon of gene ITIH5
issue.description: The reference genome has an insertion of a "G" on the reverse strand in the last coding exon of the ITIH5 gene just before the real stop codon.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF570249.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AL355374.14 and improving the alignment of ITIH5 to the reference.

issue.summary: Potential sequencing error in AL355474.15 overlaps with the FAM13C gene
issue.description: A potential sequencing error in AL355474.15 overlaps with the 5' UTR of the FAM13C gene
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459662.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AL355474.15 and improving the alignment of FAM13C to the reference.

issue.summary: No alignment between BX005393.9 and AL603906.4
issue.description: Accession swap for RP11-448K10 creates a contig building error
issue.resolution_text: Component AC006484 restored to TPF in place of BX005393

issue.summary: A gap exists between components AL731572.9 and AL442003.8
issue.description: A gap exists between components AL731572.9 and AL442003.8
issue.resolution_text: The gap in the chromosome between components AL731572.9 and AL442003.8 has been closed by the addition of sequenced components FP565721.2 and FO393433.2

issue.summary: Confirm scaffold2010_124185_250592.5:1-12840 is a correctly assembled human sequence.
issue.description: Confirm that scaffold2010_124185_250592.5:1-12840, a 12 Kb YH1 scaffold that has not alignments to sequences in NR, is a correctly assembled human sequence.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence represented by scaffold2010_124185_250592.5:1-12840 is not part of the accessioned YH1 assembly. However, it has a high quality alignment to HuRef scaffold NW_001838009.1, which projects into the assembly gap being reviewed in HG-54. Thus, scaffold2010_124185_250592.5:1-12840 does appear to be a human sequence. Further efforts to add this missing sequence will be handled in HG-54.

issue.summary: CpG island insertion in C10orf140 polymorphic?
issue.description: Compared to transcripts the genome has a >250bp insertion, containing unique sequence flanked by inverted tri-nucleotide repeats, in the coding exon of gene C10orf140. This could be a polymorphism.
issue.resolution_text: The assembly of component AL358780.22 has been checked and no error has been found. The unique sequence insertion found in AL358780.22 is a genuine polymorphism.

issue.summary: GeneID: 55844 (PPP2R2D), assembly gap
issue.status_text: 01-JUL-13: ABC8-42663600F2 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for ABC8-42663600F2: FO680657
issue.description: The first exon of NM_018461.2 (nt 1..242) fails to align to the reference genome.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC231273.2 and AC226171.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383545.1 created to capture sequence from AC231273.2 and AC226171.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: This ticket is a duplicate of HG-945.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC234305.3 and AC234230.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383546.1 created to capture sequence from AC234305.3 and AC234230.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383546.1 created to capture ~16 kb from AC234305.3 and AC234230.2 not represented in reference chromosome NC_000010.10 sequence.

issue.summary: Possible inversion in AL732434.20 (ICI-14BB7)
issue.description: There may be an inversion within AL732434.20.
issue.resolution_text: Inversion in the component caused by assembly error between two tandem repeats has been corrected. Updated version AL732434.21 contains the corrected assembly. The new assembly is consistent with optical map information from cell lines GM10890, GM15510 and GM18994.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Ns in assembly sequence
issue.description: An error occurs in GRCh37 at chr10:37412174. An undefined 'N' is present in the reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459666.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AC067744.6 correcting an undefined 'N' in the reference.

issue.summary: Possible path problem in GRCh37?
issue.description: TPF updates since GRCh37 suggest a possible path problem in this region of NC_000010.10
issue.resolution_text: The tiling path in the GRCh37 NC_000010.10 region between components AC012044.15 to AL603966.9 region was inconsistent with optical map data. This issue was resolved via a substantial re-ordering and change of components so that the region now concurs with the optical map. The updated path can be viewed at: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/genome/assembly/overlap/tpfview.cgi?taxid=9606&page=tpf&assembly=reference&chr=10. For a more detailed description of the changes that were made, please contact the GRC, referencing issue HG-1271: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/genome/assembly/grc/contact.shtml.

issue.summary: Chr10 gap problem
issue.description: A gap in the chromosome exists between components AL603965.10 and AL390716.27
issue.resolution_text: AC244230.3 has been added to the TPF closing the gap between AL603965.10 and AL390716.27. Both AL603965.10 and AL390716.27 are contained accessions under AC244230.3 and have been removed from the TPF.

issue.summary: Chr10 gap problem
issue.status_text: 06-SEP-14: ABC7-42404400C24 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for ABC7-42404400C24: FO681492
issue.description: A gap in the chromosome exists between components BX649215.1 and AL603966.9
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 8505 (PARG), missed join
issue.description: There are four partial alignments of the RefSeq NM_003631.2. Two of the hits are to components in a redundant manner suggesting that a join between AL672187 and AL731572 will represent the complete gene.
issue.resolution_text: Optical map information places AL672187 along with components AL450342 and AL589822 extending off from component AC012044. A gap exists between AL731572 and AL442003, this is consistent with the optical map information. Information for the gap between AL731572 and AL442003 can be found in HG-1074

issue.summary: Large scale sequencing/genotyping suggests two rare/wrong bases in RBM20
issue.description: Evidence from large-scale sequencing/genotyping efforts suggests that two bases in RBM20 may be represented by rare/wrong alleles in GRCh37. These bases are defined by rs1417635 and rs7070640.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contigs KF459660.1 and KF459661.1 have been added the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AL136368.14 and improving the alignment of RMB20 to the reference.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP2C19 is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP2C19 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contigs KF459663.1, KF459665.1 and KF459664.1 have been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching components AL583836.18 and AL133513.12, changing the representation of CYP2C19 to match the clinical standard.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP2E1 is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP2E1 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contigs KF459657.1 and KF459659.1 have been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AL161645.14, changing the representation of CYP2E1 to match the clinical standard.

issue.summary: Chr 10 gap problem: DUX region
issue.status_text: CH17-143F3 has been selected for sequencing for possible gap closure (this clone also being considered for the 4q DUX region: see HG-2023). 12-NOV-13: CH17-143F3 has entered the sequencing pipeline Accession for CH17-143F3: FO704911 15-JAN-16: FO704911.1 sequence is ~50% collapsed based on clone digest. Additional sequencing and assembly needed.
issue.description: A gap exists in the chromosome between AL845259.22 and AL732375.18. This gap splits the D4Z4 repeat at 10q and may also duplicate sequence in this region. The gap was inserted for GRCh38 due to a low quality alignment between AL845259.22 and AL732375.18.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 1793 (DOCK1), assembly gap
issue.description: There is a gap between BX470155.5 and AL772134.16. Exon sequence for the 5' end of the NM_001380.3 is found in BX470155.5 and AL772134.16 but intronic sequence appears to be missing in the gap region.
issue.resolution_text: Finished components FP565787.4 and FP565175.2 along with RP11 WGS contig AUXG01000230.1 have been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly closing the gap between components AL772134.16 and BX470155.5.

issue.summary: FIX patch for GeneID: 55844 (PPP2R2D), assembly gap (right side)
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between BX511297.2 and AL732395.9 causing first exon of NM_018461.2 to be missing from the reference genome, originally described in HG-113. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.
issue.resolution_text: There is an assembly gap between BX511297.2 and AL732395.9 causing first exon of NM_018461.2 to be missing from the reference genome, originally described in HG-113. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.

issue.summary: possible single base insertion disrupts potential coding gene CCNYL2
issue.description: A possible single base insertion of A disrupts the only potential coding variant of gene CCNYL2.
issue.resolution_text: The reference assembly is supported by draft BACs, AL591130.1 and AL391479.3, and HuRef scaffold, NW_001837940.1. There are no dbSNP records for a indel in the region 42941640-42941646 and data sets across all populations in the 1000 genomes study are also in agreement with the current reference assembly, suggesting that CCNYL2 is a pseudogene at this time.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence
issue.description: Unlocalized HuRef scaffold NW_001841133.1 admixture maps to the pericentromeric region of chromosome 10 (58 SNPs with LOD>=6, and 82 more SNPs with LOD>=5).
issue.resolution_text: Placement of HuRef scaffold NW_001841133.1 and overlapping BAC clone AC127389.2 to the peri-centormeric region on chromosome 10 has been determined through admixture mapping. The components have further localized through optical map analysis and have been placed on the chromosome 10 reference TPF and will be included in the GRCh38 assembly.

issue.summary: Switch point change in results in dropped sequence
issue.description: A switch point change that occurred as the result of a post-GRCh37 alignment udpate between AC024908.22 and AL713851.8 in results in dropped sequence.
issue.resolution_text: Switch points have been changed to restore sequence lost from GRCh37 through alignment curation, to the reference assembly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 100132929 (FAM25B), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Component AC244230.3: 82,169 from fix patch accession NW_003871068.1 has a T where there was a G in the previous component AL391137.11: 41,263 in build 37. This change in the fix patch results in an early in-frame stop codon in NM_001137556, which would result in this transcript losing its protein-coding capacity.
issue.resolution_text: AL391137.11 aligns to an inverted duplication present in the patch release and through OM analysis localizes to the duplication covered by AL731561, AL591684, AL603922, BX547991, BX547994. As such the AL391137 was dropped. AC244230.3 has a unique placement to the optical maps and the assembly has also been confirmed indicating that the paralogus copy present in the clone is non-coding.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226387.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226387.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: Component AC226387.3 has been added to the reference TPF to capture sequence from present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC238645.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC238645.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 10659 (CUGBP2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_006561.3 (CUGBP2) and the genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573678.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patchign component AC026887.9 and improving the alignment of CUGBP2 to the reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 26584 (DUX1), many placements, none good
issue.status_text: 12-NOV-13: CH17-143F3 has entered the sequencing pipeline 15-JAN-16: Accession for CH17-143F3: FO704911.1. Sequence is ~50% collapsed based on clone digest. Additional sequencing and assembly needed. See HG-2023 or HG-1449 for more information. FO704911.1 most likely from chr. 4 and likely doesn't contain DUX1, which maps to the acrocentric short-arms.
issue.description: DUX1 (NM_012146.1/AJ001481.1) is a member of a gene family found in dispersed heterochromatic 3.3 kb repeats in all the acrocentric chromosomes (PMID:11245978). This locus has previously been mapped to the chr. 10q component AL732375.18, but its best alignment is only 86% identity, suggesting it may actually be missing from the assembly. The gene is also missing from GRCh37 and GRCh38.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC225822.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC225822.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: Accession.version updated to correct error in clone resulting in never seen SNP's
issue.description: Accession.version updated to correct error in clone resulting in never seen SNP's (GSOFT-223)
issue.resolution_text: AL137145 has received an accession.version update to AL137145.14. This corrects an error in the clone removing a never seen SNP from the assembly.

issue.summary: PTPN20A is missing from GRCh38
issue.description: In progress
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 6435 (SFTPA1B), missed join
issue.description: AL133481.14, BX248123.5 and AL132656.15 are one side of a gap in chr. 10; on the other side is AC068139.6 and AL603703.10. This region is either a head-to-tail biological duplication, or a missed join in the asembly. NM_005411.3 aligns identically (with 100% identity) to BX248123 and AC068139.
issue.resolution_text: Components AC068139.6 and AL603703.10 have been removed from the TPF and a join made between AL132656.15 and AL135925.10.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: rare allele in PTEN
issue.description: A user has reported that the assembly may contain a rare allele in PTEN (rs71022512).
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-2334. Please see Jira issue HG-2334 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC010789.9
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines supports both the current GRCh38 assembly and variation in the region.
issue.description: Analysis of GU266897.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 10, suggest there may be ~1,639 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC010789.9. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL731569.18
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines does not support the GRCh38 assembly and are consistent with an insertion of 3kb sequence.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268407.1, GU267143.1, and GU267936.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 10, suggest there may be ~3,516 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL731569.18. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL390866.14
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping component AL391423.16 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268932.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 10, suggest there may be ~1,344 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL390866.14. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC063962.11
issue.description: Analysis GU267147.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 10, suggest there may be ~2,056 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC063962.11. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: Component AL360225 has been resubmitted recieving an accession version update to AL360225.18. This update captures sequence missing from GRCh38 due to an assembly error in component AC063962.11

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL356307.10
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis GU268767.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 10, suggest there may be ~2,902 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL356307.10. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL121749.14
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping components AL592445.8 and AL358173.11 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis GU267324.1 and GU268519.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 10, suggest there may be ~1,736 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL121749.14. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL391005.9
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis GU268699.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 10, suggest there may be ~1,209 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL391005.9. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC020641.8
issue.description: Analysis GU267566.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 10, suggest there may be ~4,256 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC020641.8. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC233758.2 has been added to the reference assembly. This sequence represents a 4.2kb insertion variation.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.resolution_text: WGS sequence contig AUXG01000085.1 has replaced GRCh38 component AEKP01147502.1 removing the ambiguous bases from the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.resolution_text: WGS sequence contig AUXG01000081.1 has replaced GRCh38 component AEKP01170919.1 removing the ambiguous bases from the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC bases in NC_000010.11: 124120674 (R) and 124120892 (Y) in component AEKP01170920.1.
issue.resolution_text: WGS sequence contig AUXG01000081.1 has replaced GRCh38 component AEKP01170920.1 removing the ambiguous bases from the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.resolution_text: WGS sequence contig AUXG01000307.1 has replaced GRCh38 component AEKP01211925.1 removing the ambiguous bases from the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.resolution_text: WGS sequence contig AUXG01000305.1 has replaced GRCh38 component AEKP01211928.1 removing the ambiguous bases from the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Assembly component AL137145.14 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AL137145.14 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: The update of assembly component AL137145.14 is described in HG-1953, no further curation is required here

issue.summary: Assembly component AL360225.18 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AL360225.18 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: The update of assembly component AL360225.18 is described in ticket HG-2191, no further curation is required here

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: FO681492.2 placement
issue.description: User questions inclusion/placement of assembly component FO681492.2 in GRCh38 due to similarities with sequence surrounding gene SYT15.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 5728 (PTEN), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is an insertion of a 'T' in the reference genome between position 471-472 of NM_001304717.1 (corresponding to position 87,864,104 of NC_000010.11). All 89 transcripts at this position are lacking the 'T' (MAF for T=0.00 for rs71022512). There is also a mismatch in the genome at position 511 of NM_001304717.1 (corresponding to position 87,864,144 of NC_000010.11). The reference genome has a 'G' at this position, but all 89 transcripts have a 'C' (MAF for G=0.0000 for rs2943772).
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between components AC063965.8 and AC022016.7 has been changed to represent component AC022016.7 in the reference assembly. This update corrects two sequence errors corresponding to positions 87864104 (rs71022512) and 87864144 (rs2943772) in NC_000010.11.

issue.summary: GRCh38 represents rare insertion allele in PTEN (rs71022512)
issue.description: The T insertion at GRCh38 NC_000019.11 nt 87864104 (dbSNP: rs71022512) was not observed in the 1000G Phase 3 May 2013 call set. The GRC will investigate to determine if there is a sequencing error at this position.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-2334. Please see Jira issue HG-2334 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.summary: GeneID: 5076 (PAX2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: Currently determining how best to represent variation in the reference.
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_003987.3 (PAX2) and the genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 5408 (PNLIPRP2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_005396.4 (PNLIPRP2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR performed and an error found in the reference component AC016825. The PCR has been submitted to EMBL/GenBank accession FO082044.1, this has been added to the TPF to correct the reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 9849 (ZNF518A), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_014803.3 (ZNF518A) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR performed and an error found in the reference component AC021037. The PCR has been submitted to EMBL/GenBank accession FO082045.1, this has been added to the TPF to correct the reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 64106 (NPFFR1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_022146.2 (NPFFR1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Reference assembly is correct, error occuring in splign alignment. Correct alignment for exon1 of NM_022146.2 (NPFFR1) in component AL355138.19 is at position 41335-41359 of the submission.

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between BX276080.7 and AL365356.13
issue.resolution_text: Short overlap (6 bp) detected between BX276080.7 and AL365356.13; overlap certified and gap closed (This issue is redundant to HG-97)

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem Region #2
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is larger than reported gap size between AL683842.11 and AL606510.10
issue.resolution_text: In GRCh38, clones FP885909.2, FO082810.4 and FO681490.4 and WGS contigs ABBA01016369.1, AEKP01170920.1, AEKP01170919.1 and ABBA01016844.1 were provided as extensions into this gap. Subsequent to GRCh38, WGS contig AUXG01000081.1 replaced ABBA01016369.1, AEKP01170920.1, and AEKP01170919.1 and closed the gap. For more information on the post-GRCh38 updates, see HG-2242 and HG-2243.

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX322596.3 and BX322596.3
issue.resolution_text: BX322596 is an unfinished component not in the reference TPF.

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX255924.4 and AL928729.2
issue.resolution_text: Artificial gap caused by artificial duplication of flanking regions. Confirmed by FibreFISH and Optical Map data. Components AL928580, BX255924 and AL928729 removed from the reference and gap closed.

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL133216.10 and AL133173.20
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL590623.16 and BX322613.6
issue.resolution_text: This issue duplicates HG-549.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL590623.16 and BX322613.6

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL603965.10 and AL954360.3
issue.resolution_text: The tiling path in the GRCh37 NC_000010.10 region between components AC012044.15 to AL603966.9 region was inconsistent with optical map data. This issue was resolved via a substantial re-ordering and change of components so that the region now concurs with the optical map. The updated path can be viewed at: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/genome/assembly/overlap/tpfview.cgi?taxid=9606&page=tpf&assembly=reference&chr=10. For a more detailed description of the changes that were made, please contact the GRC, referencing issue HG-1271: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/genome/assembly/grc/contact.shtml.

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL672187.12 and AL589822.18
issue.resolution_text: Gap between components AL672187 and AL589822 closed by component AL450342.

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL607044.24 and BX294094.5
issue.resolution_text: In GRCh38, WGS contigs were used to extend into this gap from AL607044.24 and BX294094.5, but a small gap remained. Subsequent to the release of GRCh38, the gap in the TPF has been closed with se of WGS contig AUXG01000085.1. See HG-2241 for additional information on the update to GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non existant clone XX-Y758A6__A in TPF
issue.description: Gap exists between components AL731572 and AL672187
issue.resolution_text: XX-Y758A6__A removed fron the TPG and Gap inserted

issue.summary: Non existant clone XX-Y758A6__B in TPF
issue.description: Gap exists between components AL672187 and AL589822
issue.resolution_text: XX-Y758A6__B removed from the TPF and gap inserted.

issue.summary: BX842243 is redundant under AL135793
issue.description: BX842243 is redundant under AL135793
issue.resolution_text: BX842243 removed from the TPF as redundant under AL135793

issue.summary: Gap exists between AL683842 and AL606510
issue.description: Non-existent clone XX-Y761G8 is on TPF between AL683842 and AL606510
issue.resolution_text: XX-Y761G8 removed from the TPF and a gap inserted

issue.summary: Gap exists between BX511297 and AL732395
issue.description: Gap exists between BX511297 and AL732395
issue.resolution_text: XX-Y637E10 removed from the TPF and gap inserted.

issue.summary: Sequence from cDNA AK131335 missing from genome
issue.description: Sequence from cDNA AK131335 missing from genome, but present when the switchpoint is moved so that the overlaping sequence comes from AL355303.
issue.resolution_text: AL391427.9 contains a deletion causing disruption to the cDNA AK131335. The missing sequence is present in the overlapping BAC AL355303. AL355303 has been updated (AL355303.17) to represent the missing sequence in the reference assembly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 10431 (TIMM23), assembly gap, chromosome
issue.description: The assembly gap between AL672187.12 and AL589822.18 may contain the last exon of NM_006327.2 (TIMM23, GeneID 10431).
issue.resolution_text: Gap between components AL672187 and AL589822 closed by component AL450342.

issue.summary: Chr. 10 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between the telomere and component AL713922.12
issue.resolution_text: AC215217 (ABC7-43086900J11) aligns to AL713922 and contains telomeric sequence, providing a terminal extension of GRCh37 NC_000010.10.

issue.summary: Missing sequence from clone RP11-748L13?
issue.description: Alignments to HuRef suggest ~47kb may be missing from AL355493.14 (RP11-748L13)
issue.resolution_text: The sequence was added to GRCh37 as NOVEL patch GL383545.1. It appears to represent an alternate haplotype.

issue.summary: Poor alignment between AL845259.22 and AL732375.18
issue.description: Poor alignment between AL845259.22 and AL732375.18
issue.resolution_text: Divergent alignment between components AL845259.22 and AL732375.18 suggests no join exists and the region is artificially small. A gap has been inserted in to the TFP and progress can be followed in JIRA issue HG-1449

issue.summary: HuRef alignment suggests chr. 10 gap between BX276080.7 and AL365356.13 may be closed
issue.description: Alignment of HuRef WGS contig NW_001837931.2 to reference chr.10 suggests the gap between BX276080.7 and AL365356.13 may be closed without additional sequence
issue.resolution_text: Short overlap (6 bp) detected between BX276080.7 and AL365356.13; overlap certified and gap closed .

issue.summary: two-base deletion in AL355530.6 affecting splice variant of ATRNL1 gene
issue.description: A deletion of two Ts in AL355530.6 affects the coding region of a splice variant of the ATRNL1 gene. All transcripts matching here disagree with the genome.
issue.resolution_text: Finished component AC016042.8 has been inserted in to the TPF in order to represent a coding form of a splice variant of the ATRNL1 gene.

issue.summary: Chr.10 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between AL607044.24 and BX294094.5.
issue.resolution_text: A 5kb extension into this gap since GRCh37 was released as a FIX patch for GRCh37: GL383544.1.
